title: Sweetheart Orriana Ball Disappearance- Gameplay
body:
Was playing an ARAM when quite abruptly the ball disappeared when it was hovering over Orriana. I could still cast it and it would show up on the ground, but disappeared when Orriana picked it up. It showed up for E (when casted on other people) though. Not sure if other people could see it.  Sorta annoying.
Thanks for looking {{champion:223}}

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is something we are aware of. It's affecting all skins, as well as the base. We're still looking for a solid repro for this one. Thanks for the report!

I'm not sure how to reproduce it, You could try playing with a Lee Sin, Varus, Kassadin, or a Fiddle on your team, or against an Naut, WW, Garen, Aatrox, or Viktor.
I was 3 / 5 / 35 with a double kill.
I had a Luden's,  Sorc, Rylai's, Seeker's Arm., and NLR
